short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover estimated reading time & word count of any online content with one click with Reading Time Calculator & Word Counter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Reading Time Calculator & Word Counter by CodeZy is here to enhance your online reading experience. 

With a single click, our Chrome extension provides you with both the estimated reading time &  word count for any webpage or document. No more surprises or time misjudgments when diving into articles, e-books, or any online content.

Whether you're browsing a blog, research paper, online book, or any other website, Reading Time Calculator & Wordcounter enables you to make informed decisions about what to read and when.

Download it Today, and make your life easier.
